org.apache.beam.runners.fnexecution.graph

Class LengthPrefixUnknownCoders

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.beam.runners.fnexecution.graph.LengthPrefixUnknownCoders

  • public class LengthPrefixUnknownCoders
extends java.lang.Object
    Utilities for replacing or wrapping unknown coders with LengthPrefixCoder.

    TODO: Support a dynamic list of well known coders using either registration or manual listing.

      Recursively traverse the coder tree and wrap the first unknown coder in every branch with a LengthPrefixCoder unless an ancestor coder is itself a LengthPrefixCoder.

    • Method Detail

      • forCoder

        public static org.apache.beam.model.pipeline.v1.RunnerApi.MessageWithComponents forCoder(java.lang.String coderId,
                                                                                         org.apache.beam.model.pipeline.v1.RunnerApi.Components components,
                                                                                         boolean replaceWithByteArrayCoder)
        Recursively traverse the coder tree and wrap the first unknown coder in every branch with a LengthPrefixCoder unless an ancestor coder is itself a LengthPrefixCoder. If replaceWithByteArrayCoder is set, then replace that unknown coder with a ByteArrayCoder. Note that no ids that are generated will collide with the ids supplied within the coder map key space.
        Parameters:
        coderId - The root coder contained within coders to start the recursive descent from.
        components - Contains the root coder and all component coders.
        replaceWithByteArrayCoder - whether to replace an unknown coder with a ByteArrayCoder.
        Returns:
        A RunnerApi.MessageWithComponents with the root coder and its component coders. Note that no ids that are generated will collide with the ids supplied within the coder map key space.
